fields.description:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-14651 tried changing the max attempted task attempts to 1 (i.e. fail fast if a task attempt fails).

This caused TestMiniLlapCliDriver. hybridgrace_hashjoin_1.
Turns out there's a first attempt which fails when running some queries in this q file. The same attempt succeeds on the next task attempt.

{code}

fields.summary: TestMiniLlapCliDriver. hybridgrace_hashjoin_1 - the first attempt for a couple of tasks fails
